question: Which State/UT has recently launched “Mukhyamantri Septic Tank Safai Yojana”?
explanation: Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on November 15, 2019 launched ‘Mukhyamantri Septic Tank Safai Yojana’. It is a scheme aimed at helping people in waste management and ensuring the safety of sanitation workers. Delhi Jal Board (DJB) will deploy 80 trucks along with trained staff to ensure cleaning and maintenance of septic tanks across Delhi.
